SEARCH
Package com.app.service.impl.crud

Class ClientServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.app.service.impl.crud.GenericServiceImpl<ClientEntity,Client>
com.app.service.impl.crud.ClientServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientService, CrudService<Client>
@Service public class ClientServiceImpl extends GenericServiceImpl<ClientEntity,Client> implements ClientService
Implementation of the ClientService interface, providing business logic for managing clients.

This service provides methods for adding a single client or multiple clients to the system. It ensures that each client is unique by checking for the existence of clients based on their name and surname before adding them to the repository.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientServiceImpl

      public ClientServiceImpl(ClientRepository repository, Converter<ClientEntity,Client> converter, Validator<ClientDto> validator, ClientRepository clientRepository, ClientsConverter clientsConverter)
      Constructs a new ClientServiceImpl with the specified dependencies.

      This constructor initializes the required repository, validator, and converter for handling client data.

      Parameters:
      repository - the ClientRepository to interact with the database
      converter - the Converter to convert between ClientEntity and Client
      validator - the Validator used to validate client DTOs
      clientRepository - the ClientRepository for checking if clients already exist
      clientsConverter - the ClientsConverter to convert a list of client DTOs into entities

  • Method Details

    • addClient

      public Long addClient(ClientDto clientDto)
      Adds a single client to the system.

      This method validates the provided client DTO, checks if the client already exists based on their name and surname, and if not, saves the client in the repository. If a client with the same name and surname exists, a ResourceAlreadyExistException is thrown.

      Specified by:
      addClient in interface ClientService
      Parameters:
      clientDto - the ClientDto object containing the client data to be added
      Returns:
      the ID of the newly added client
      Throws:
      ResourceAlreadyExistException - if a client with the same name and surname already exists in the system

    • addClients

      public List<Long> addClients(List<ClientDto> clientsDto)
      Adds a list of clients to the system.

      This method validates each client DTO, checks if each client already exists, and saves the list of clients in the repository. If a client with the same name and surname exists, a ResourceAlreadyExistException is thrown with the specific client's details.

      Specified by:
      addClients in interface ClientService
      Parameters:
      clientsDto - a list of ClientDto objects containing the client data to be added
      Returns:
      a list of IDs of the newly added clients
      Throws:
      ResourceAlreadyExistException - if any client in the list already exists
